subject: Football
Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: The Jets are 10-17 since Idzik was hired as general manager, and the owner, Woody Johnson, will have to weigh his frustration against his confidence in the long-term plan Idzik has charted.
snippet: The Jets are 10-17 since Idzik was hired as general manager, and the owner, Woody Johnson, will have to weigh his frustration against his confidence in the long-term plan Idzik has charted.
